synopsis.text: Sakura Kyoko and Kaname Madoka find themselves in a dark reality where the magical girls they once admired are doomed to become witches, fueling the universe's survival through the energy born from their despair. Madoka's dear friend, Sayaka Miki, falls victim to this cruel fate, causing Kyoko to make a desperate attempt to save her, ultimately sacrificing herself. Homura Akemi, a magical girl from another timeline, is revealed to have been reliving the same month in hopes of saving Madoka from a tragic destiny at the hands of the ultimate witch, Walpurgisnacht. As Homura faces defeat and despair, Madoka appears, harnessing the energy from multiple timelines to become a powerful magical girl capable of eradicating witches before their birth. In this tale of unavoidable destiny, Madoka must choose between honoring Homura's wish and saving the world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
